mapper.sql: ID, CHNL_ID, NAME, STATE, RES1, RES2, RES3, RES4, LAST_TIME,ABOUT
mapper.select: select count(*) from ver_channel where STATE='01' and CHNL_ID=#{chnlId}
mapper.insert:
insert into ver_channel
ID,
CHNL_ID,
NAME,
STATE,
RES1,
RES2,
RES3,
RES4,
LAST_TIME,
ABOUT,

mapper.update:
update ver_channel
CHNL_ID = #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES1 = #{res1,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES2 = #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES3 = #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES4 = #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ABOUT = #{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ver_channel set CHNL_ID = #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES1 = #{res1,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES2 = #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES3 = #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES4 = #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ABOUT = #{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
